A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't really understand the uproar from the audience over this movie. I understand people may feel that there was a lot left to be desired by questions that were answered/left unanswered from The Force Awakens\, but a 56% people! C'mon\, that's ridiculous! I personally loved the movie\, but it did have some flaws\, thus the 4/5 stars. Somehow\, I get the feeling JJ Abrams is setting up for something bigger in Episode IX (and yes\, I know Rian Johnson wrote the story\, but Abrams has a higher story arc Johnson followed. I'm sure of that).
